Key Match Events: The White Sox rallied to score three runs in the bottom of the eighth and held on for a 3-2 victory.
Pre-Game Insights: The White Sox were looking to avoid a 121st loss, which would’ve surpassed the New York Mets’ 120 losses in 1962.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was a strange night for the Sox, with the Angels taking the lead in the 7th inning and quickly making it 2-0 in the top of the 8th.
